analysis.description:
ShibbolethToken.ShibbolethToken (/unique_chucks/36/0xac862105a7ca6906d10c56fe5cf61587a04ddff4.sol#139-149) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-rr.claimWithResolver(this,this) (/unique_chucks/36/0xac862105a7ca6906d10c56fe5cf61587a04ddff4.sol#148)

Reentrancy in ShibbolethTokenFactory.create (/unique_chucks/36/0xac862105a7ca6906d10c56fe5cf61587a04ddff4.sol#217-231):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ens.owner(subnode) == 0) (/unique_chucks/36/0xac862105a7ca6906d10c56fe5cf61587a04ddff4.sol#223-226)
	- ens.setSubnodeOwner(rootNode,sha3()(symbol),this) (/unique_chucks/36/0xac862105a7ca6906d10c56fe5cf61587a04ddff4.sol#226-227)
	- ens.setResolver(subnode,this) (/unique_chucks/36/0xac862105a7ca6906d10c56fe5cf61587a04ddff4.sol#227-228)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- addr (/unique_chucks/36/0xac862105a7ca6906d10c56fe5cf61587a04ddff4.sol#228)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/36/0xac862105a7ca6906d10c56fe5cf61587a04ddff4.sol#220-221:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/36/0xac862105a7ca6906d10c56fe5cf61587a04ddff4.sol#226-227:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
